Text: Thanks!  I've been looking for a good copy of these (Blue, White & Red) since I tried the MELiTE releases, and saw that they sucked.
Yeah, MELiTE had a few bad releases lately, including the Three Colors Trilogy

Thank you so so much.

I think the French release is actually interlaced, but done so well that I didn't spot any instance of combing.

The funeral scenes as seen on philip minitv has severe freezing issues.

And the first black fade has compression artifacts everywhere.

Again, thanks a million for this.  Amazon.fr charges a limb for this set.
